title: Pineapple rice
description: Yunnan province in southwest China borders on southeast Asia, and I discovered to my joy how similar some of the dishes were to Thai cuisine. This dish combines fruit with a savoury mixture. It’s easy to make and makes a delicious change.
ingredients: long grain rice measured to the 400ml/14fl oz level in a measuring jug and cooked according to packet instructions
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 small pineapple (approximately 225g/8oz), peeled, cored and chopped into 1cm/½in pieces
